channel.title: two on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in two on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-28
item.description: LG Display shows off a versatile lineup of transparent OLED screens at CES 2022 (3 minute read) LG Display has unveiled several new concepts that will be on display at CES 2022.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-16
item.description: Excerpt: How Google bought Android—according to folks in the room (12 minute read) A new book from a long-time Android engineer offers a behind-the-scenes look at early Android development.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-07
item.description: Signal is testing a payments feature that lets you send cryptocurrency to friends (1 minute read) Signal is testing a new peer-to-peer payment system in the UK called Signal Payments.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-10
item.description: Hyundai purchases Boston Dynamics for $921M, makers of Spot dog robot (1 minute read) Hyundai has purchased Boston Dynamics for around $921 million.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-27
item.description: Facebook unveils free-to-play cloud gaming service (7 minute read) Facebook Gaming has been launched in beta for a limited group of people.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-15
item.description: Facebook leak reveals Oculus Quest 2 as a 4K standalone VR headset (2 minute read) Facebook is expected to unveil the Oculus Quest 2 at the Facebook Connect conference later this week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-03
item.description: ByteDance and Microsoft deal for TikTok to stay in the U.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-29
item.description: Apple threatens to remove Airbnb from App Store over virtual experiences commission (2 minute read) Apple has demanded a 30% commission for sales of online classes sold by Airbnb and ClassPass.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-06
item.description: Samsung’s Galaxy Watch 3 software detailed in new leak (2 minute read) Samsung’s Galaxy Watch 3 will likely feature customizable watch faces and updates to its music, email, and calendar apps.
